edu.harvard.hul.ois.fits.tools
Class ToolBase

java.lang.Object
  edu.harvard.hul.ois.fits.tools.ToolBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tool, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ADLTool, AudioInfo, Droid, Exiftool, FFIdent, FileInfo, FileUtility, Jhove, MetadataExtractor, TikaTool, XmlMetadata
public abstract class ToolBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tool

An abstract class implementing the Tool interface, the base for all FITS tools.
